tool_input.content:
ValidationCodeHook v0.1.0
Build date: 2025-09-10
Status: Release Candidate

Features implemented (from todo.md):
- [x] A1-A2: Configuration & Predicates
- [x] B1-B4: PreToolUse anti-deception
- [x] C1-C2: Security context-awareness  
- [x] D1-D3: PostToolUse structured output
- [x] E1: UserPromptSubmit compact context
- [x] F2-F3: JS/TS/Python language rules
- [x] G1: Quick tips & glossary
- [x] H1: Determinism & caps
- [x] I1-I3: Performance & observability
- [x] J1-J3: UserPromptSubmit hardening
- [x] K1-K4: Documentation
- [x] L1-L5: Dependencies & duplicates
- [x] M1: Golden snapshots

Binary sizes:
- posttooluse.exe: ~18MB
- pretooluse.exe: ~18MB  
- userpromptsubmit.exe: ~17MB

Supported languages:
Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C#, Go, Rust, C/C++, PHP, Ruby

Performance:
- AST parse: <50ms typical
- Soft budget support
- Graceful skip for large files
